evidence.claim: Phreesia utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure to support their platforms.
The platform supports X12 transaction sets for health insurance claims processing.
Phreesia follows HIPAA compliance guidelines to ensure data security and privacy.
Integration capabilities with FHIR for broader healthcare data interoperability.
Offering RESTful APIs for seamless integration with other healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: Phreesia utilizes X12 transactions for healthcare claims and eligibility, aligning with API-first approach.
matched_use_cases: Integration with Payer and Provider systems using APIs
